name: heedy-notebook-plugin
description: Allows using jupyter notebooks from heedy

scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:js
scripts.build:html: test -d ./public && npm run sync:html && html-minifier --file-ext html --input-dir ../dist/notebook/public --output-dir ../dist/notebook/public --minify-css --minify-js --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace --case-sensitive --no-include-auto-generated-tags  || echo 'Skipping public'
scripts.watch:html: test -d ./public && nodemon --watch public -e html,css,js,json,svg,png --exec "npm run sync:html" || echo 'Skipping public'

author: Heedy Contributors
